  33. ‌char * default_runtime_path = RUNTIME_NAME;

  36. ‌#define MAXPATHLEN 1024

  39. #ifndef S_ISREG
  40. ‌#define S_ISREG(mode) (((mode) & S_IFMT) == S_IFREG)
  41. #endif

  43. #ifndef SEEK_END
  44. ‌#define SEEK_END 2

  47. #ifndef __CYGWIN__

  49. /* Normal Unix search path function */

  51. ‌static char * searchpath(char * name)
  52. {
  53.   static char fullname[MAXPATHLEN + 1];
  54.   char * path;
  55.   char * p;
  56.   char * q;
  57.   struct stat st;

  59.   for (p = name; *p != 0; p++) {
  60.     if (*p == '/') return name;
  61.   }
  62.   path = getenv("PATH");
  63.   if (path == NULL) return name;
  64.   while(1) {
  65.     for (p = fullname; *path != 0 && *path != ':'; p++, path++)
  66.       if (p < fullname + MAXPATHLEN) *p = *path;
  67.     if (p != fullname && p < fullname + MAXPATHLEN)
  68.       *p++ = '/';
  69.     for (q = name; *q != 0; p++, q++)
  70.       if (p < fullname + MAXPATHLEN) *p = *q;
  71.     *p = 0;
  72.     if (stat(fullname, &st) == 0 && S_ISREG(st.st_mode)) break;
  73.     if (*path == 0) return name;
  74.     path++;
  75.   }
  76.   return fullname;
  77. }

  79. #else

  81. /* Special version for Cygwin32: takes care of the ".exe" implicit suffix */

  83. ‌static int file_ok(char * name)
  84. {
  85.   int fd;
  86.   /* Cannot use stat() here because it adds ".exe" implicitly */
  87.   fd = open(name, O_RDONLY);
  88.   if (fd == -1) return 0;
  89.   close(fd);
  90.   return 1;
  91. }

  93. ‌static char * searchpath(char * name)
  94. {
  95.   char * path, * fullname, * p;

  97.   path = getenv("PATH");
  98.   fullname = malloc(strlen(name) + (path == NULL ? 0 : strlen(path)) + 6);
  99.   /* 6 = "/" plus ".exe" plus final "\0" */
  100.   if (fullname == NULL) return name;
  101.   /* Check for absolute path name */
  102.   for (p = name; *p != 0; p++) {
  103.     if (*p == '/' || *p == '\\') {
  104.       if (file_ok(name)) return name;
  105.       strcpy(fullname, name);
  106.       strcat(fullname, ".exe");
  107.       if (file_ok(fullname)) return fullname;
  108.       return name;
  109.     }
  110.   }
  111.   /* Search in path */
  112.   if (path == NULL) return name;
  113.   while(1) {
  114.     for (p = fullname; *path != 0 && *path != ':'; p++, path++) *p = *path;
  115.     if (p != fullname) *p++ = '/';
  116.     strcpy(p, name);
  117.     if (file_ok(fullname)) return fullname;
  118.     strcat(fullname, ".exe");
  119.     if (file_ok(fullname)) return fullname;
  120.     if (*path == 0) break;
  121.     path++;
  122.   }
  123.   return name;
  124. }

  126. #endif

  128. ‌static unsigned long read_size(char * ptr)
  129. {
  130.   unsigned char * p = (unsigned char *) ptr;
  131.   return ((unsigned long) p[0] << 24) + ((unsigned long) p[1] << 16) +
  132.          ((unsigned long) p[2] << 8) + p[3];
  133. }

  135. ‌static char * read_runtime_path(int fd)
  136. {
  137.   char buffer[TRAILER_SIZE];
  138.   static char runtime_path[MAXPATHLEN];
  139.   int num_sections, i;
  140.   uint32_t path_size;
  141.   long ofs;

  143.   lseek(fd, (long) -TRAILER_SIZE, SEEK_END);
  144.   if (read(fd, buffer, TRAILER_SIZE) < TRAILER_SIZE) return NULL;
  145.   num_sections = read_size(buffer);
  146.   ofs = TRAILER_SIZE + num_sections * 8;
  147.   lseek(fd, -ofs, SEEK_END);
  148.   path_size = 0;
  149.   for (i = 0; i < num_sections; i++) {
  150.     if (read(fd, buffer, 8) < 8) return NULL;
  151.     if (buffer[0] == 'R' && buffer[1] == 'N' &&
  152.         buffer[2] == 'T' && buffer[3] == 'M') {
  153.       path_size = read_size(buffer + 4);
  154.       ofs += path_size;
  155.     } else if (path_size > 0)
  156.       ofs += read_size(buffer + 4);
  157.   }
  158.   if (path_size == 0) return default_runtime_path;
  159.   if (path_size >= MAXPATHLEN) return NULL;
  160.   lseek(fd, -ofs, SEEK_END);
  161.   if (read(fd, runtime_path, path_size) != path_size) return NULL;
  162.   runtime_path[path_size - 1] = 0;
  163.   return runtime_path;
  164. }

  166. ‌static void errwrite(char * msg)
  167. {
  168.   write(2, msg, strlen(msg));
  169. }

  171. #ifndef O_BINARY
  172. ‌#define O_BINARY 0
  173. #endif

  175. ‌int main(int argc, char ** argv)
  176. {
  177.   char * truename, * runtime_path;
  178.   int fd;

  180.   truename = searchpath(argv[0]);
  181.   fd = open(truename, O_RDONLY | O_BINARY);
  182.   if (fd == -1 || (runtime_path = read_runtime_path(fd)) == NULL) {
  183.     errwrite(truename);
  184.     errwrite(" not found or is not a bytecode executable file\n");
  185.     return 2;
  186.   }
  187.   argv[0] = truename;
  188.   execv(runtime_path, argv);
  189.   errwrite("Cannot exec ");
  190.   errwrite(runtime_path);
  191.   errwrite("\n");
  192.   return 2;
  193. }
